title: Yuri Pershin (footballer, born 1999)
text:
Yuri Sergeyevich Pershin (; born 3 March 1999) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20SKA-Khabarovsk">FC SKA-Khabarovsk</a> and <a href="FC%20SKA-Khabarovsk-2">FC SKA-Khabarovsk-2</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Dynamo%20Bryansk">FC Dynamo Bryansk</a> on 1 August 2020 in a game against <a href="FC%20Orenburg">FC Orenburg</a>, he substituted <a href="Pavel%20Baranov">Pavel Baranov</a> at half-time.
